jobDescription: Job Type: Temp to PermPay Rate: $38/hourlyThe Data Quality Analyst is responsible for reviewing assigned business processes within the data supply chain from end to end to identify and address operational challenges. The Data Quality Analyst will be required to gather important county data and be able to translate the data into digestible information for the operation team to utilize. Our ideal candidate has the ability to work on multiple tasks/assignments simultaneously. Post Job Requirements Bachelor's Degree Required; Masters PreferredPartner with stakeholders to develop comprehensive plan to establish county relationships to ensure data qualityCreate communication channels to compile required data from counties vendors etc as requiredTranslate the county layout/format data into the keying instructions proactivelyCreate or update documentation as required3+ years of work experienceProficient at Microsoft OfficeStrong communication skillsResults driven orientedActs as liaison between business and operations
